mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberMobile, fileAttached) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberMobile}, #{fileAttached})
insert into member_file(originalFileName, storedFileName, member_id) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{member_id})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
